      • EditPHRAction

        public EditPHRAction(DAOFactory factory,
             long loggedInMID,
             java.lang.String pidString)
              throws iTrustException,
                     DBException
        Super class validates the patient id
        ??:
        factory - The DAOFactory to be used in creating DAOs for this action.
        loggedInMID - The MID of the currently logged in user who is authorizing this action.
        pidString - The MID of the patient whose personal health records are being added.
        ??:
        iTrustException
        DBException
        NoHealthRecordsException
